mapper.insert: insert into MM_CONTRACTOR (PK_ID, NAME,CN_NAME,HTTP_URL, PRINCIPAL, MOBILE, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, EXTEND_FIELD1, EXTEND_FIELD2,FTP_PASSWORD) values (#{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{httpUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{principal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uptUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uptTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extendField1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extendField2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{ftpPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update MM_CONTRACTOR set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CN_NAME = #{cnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HTTP_URL = #{httpUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRINCIPAL = #{principal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLG = #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, CRT_USER = #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRT_TIME = #{crtTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPT_USER = #{uptUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPT_TIME = #{uptTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXTEND_FIELD1 = #{extendField1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXTEND_FIELD2 = #{extendField2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FTP_PASSWORD = #{ftpPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PK_ID, NAME,CN_NAME, HTTP_URL, PRINCIPAL, MOBILE, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, EXTEND_FIELD1, EXTEND_FIELD2,FTP_PASSWORD from MM_CONTRACTOR where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select PK_ID, NAME,CN_NAME, HTTP_URL, PRINCIPAL, MOBILE, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, EXTEND_FIELD1, EXTEND_FIELD2,FTP_PASSWORD from MM_CONTRACTOR

select PK_ID, NAME,CN_NAME, HTTP_URL, PRINCIPAL, MOBILE, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, EXTEND_FIELD1, EXTEND_FIELD2,FTP_PASSWORD from MM_CONTRACTOR where DEL_FLG = '0' and NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select PK_ID, NAME,CN_NAME, HTTP_URL, PRINCIPAL, MOBILE, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, EXTEND_FIELD1, EXTEND_FIELD2,FTP_PASSWORD from MM_CONTRACTOR where DEL_FLG = '0' and NAME like '%'||#{name}||'%' and CN_NAME like '%'||#{cnName}||'%' and PRINCIPAL like '%'||#{principal}||'%' and HTTP_URL like '%'||#{httpUrl}||'%' and NOTE like '%'||#{note}||'%' and CRT_TIME >= #{crtTimeStart} and #{crtTimeEnd} >= CRT_TIME and UPT_TIME >= #{uptTimeStart} and #{uptTimeEnd} >= UPT_TIME and CRT_USER like '%'||#{crtUser}||'%' and UPT_USER like '%'||#{uptUser}||'%' order by UPT_TIME desc, CRT_TIME desc, NAME asc
